actions.description: The option list of the the action sheet

cancelText.description: The text of the cancel button , if it is null, the cancel button would not be displayed
cancelText.description_zh: 取消按钮的文本，如果为空，则不会显示取消按钮

closeOnAction.description: Whether to close after clicking the option
closeOnAction.description_zh: 是否在单击选项后关闭

closeOnMaskClick.description: Whether to close after clicking the mask layer
closeOnMaskClick.description_zh: 单击蒙版图层后是否关闭

extra.description: The extra area at the top of the the action sheet
extra.description_zh: 操作表顶部的额外区域

getContainer.description: Get the specified mounted HTML node, the default is body, if null returned, it would be rendered to the current node
getContainer.description_zh: 获取指定的挂载 HTML 节点，默认为 body，如果返回 null，则渲染到当前节点

safeArea.description: Whether to enable safe area padding
safeArea.description_zh: 是否启用安全区域填充

visible.description: To show or hide the action sheet

events.name: onAction
events.description: Triggered when an option is clicked, never triggered when the ActionSheet is disabled or loading
events.description_zh: 在单击选项时触发，在禁用或加载 ActionSheet 时从不触发

events.name: onMaskClick
events.description: Triggered when the mask layer is clicked
